properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PLAYER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM( SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS BOARDNO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,B.CREATE_DATE AS BOARD_CREATEDATE ,REPLY_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT ,R.CREATE_DATE AS REPLY_CREATEDATE FROM BOARD B JOIN REPLY R ON(B.BOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
